isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER PSO140-61 - REASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Insert interlock spring into cover ( Figure 51).

figure.caption: Figure 51. Insert Interlock Spring into Cover

step1.para: Install the 1st-Rev. rod, shift bracket, and fork ( Figure 52). Tighten the set screws to 26 to 32 ft-lbs. (35 to 43 N•m).

figure.caption: Figure 52. Install 1st-Reverse Rod, Shift Bracket, and Fork

step1.para: Insert interlock pin into 2nd-3rd shift rod ( Figure 53).

figure.caption: Figure 53. Insert Interlock Pin into 2nd-3rd Shift Rod

step1.para: Install interlock poppet into the cover ( Figure 54).

figure.caption: Figure 54. Install Interlock Poppet into Cover

caution.para: During the installation of each rod, careful attention is needed to insure the proper installation of all interlocks. These interlocks prevent the transmission from being shifted into two gears at the same time.

step1.para: Install the 2nd-3rd shift fork and tighten set screw to 26 to 32 ft-lbs. (35 to 43 N•m). ( Figure 55). Be sure to check each shift rod for free movement as the reassembly progresses.
Install the 4th shift rod, fork, and bracket ( Figure 56). Tighten the set screw to 13 to 18 ft-lbs. (17 to 24 N•m).

figure.caption: Figure 56. Install 4th Shift Rod, Fork, and Bracket

caution.para: Shift bracket set screw has fine threads. Limit torque to 13 to 18 ft-lbs. (17 to 24 N•m).

step1.para: Install the last interlock pin and poppet ( Figure 57). Install the spring poppet.

figure.caption: Figure 57. Install Last Interlock Pin and Poppet

step1.para: Compress spring poppet and insert rod with interlock hole facing upward ( Figure 58). Positioning the rod in this manner will prevent damage to shift bracket plunger spring when installing the rod.

figure.caption: Figure 58. Compress Spring Poppet and Insert Rod

step1.para: Insert plunger, ball and spring into 5th-6th shift bracket ( Figure 59). Compress spring and install shift bracket assembly to the rod. Add 5th-6th shift fork and tighten set screw to 26 to 32 ft-lbs. (35 to 43 N•m).

figure.caption: Figure 59. Insert Plunger, Ball and Spring into 5th-6th Shift Bracket

step1.para: Install oil trough onto cover assembly. Tighten the bolts to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 N•m) ( Figure 60). With the shifter housing reassembly completed, it is advisable to check for the proper functioning of these interlocks. Shift one fork into gear; if all interlocks are installed correctly, none of the other forks will shift into gear.

figure.caption: Figure 60. Install Oil Trough onto Cover Assembly
